title: Wire up a shower and replace a fuse with another.
review: Fantastically prompt.  Within half an hour of requesting a quote, Ashley had been in touch to arrange a time to come a view the work that needed doing.  Very honest and open about how he was going to approach it.  He also offered some professional advice on other bits.  Fantatsic will definitely use again for any further work.
name: Renegade Electrical Ltd
